name: Impale
description:
What could be more funny than killing hordes of zombies? Kill zombies with spikes, saws, hooks, fire, electricity and many other tools!

Player should throw zombies in diffrent traps on the level to kill them. Is necessary to use all traps on each level to complete it. Some traps are located in remote and tricky places. Player must use all his agility and accuracy to complete all 50 levels.
